item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1780; 10:22PM; 250 E 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RxMba9; #Florence; It took 36 firefighters (in mostly defensive mode) 33 minutes to extinguish all flames in the vacant home. Firefighters will be on scene for an extended period of time to overhaul the structure. No reported injuries. Unknown cause.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E221 E233 E264 E64 E66 RA257 RA865 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1780; 09:49PM; 250 E 80th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RxMba9; #Florence; One-story, single-family home (possibly vacant) with heavy fire showing. title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/02/2022 INC#1295

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1295; 05:48PM; 766 E 17th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CQW92f; #DowntownLA; Several incoming companies were cancelled, leaving a total of 70 firefighters assigned to the blaze at a 2,254 sq-ft commercial structure built in 1999. Firefighters overcame challenges with wires down in front of the address and heavily fortified security measures on the exterior of the building to extinguish the flames in 49 minutes. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CE43 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E20 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E27 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 JT1 RA14 RA3 RA803 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15 T2 T21 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/02/2022 INC#1295

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1295; 05:40PM; 766 E 17th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CQW92f; #DowntownLA; The one-story commercial building (approx 50' x 50') is heavily fortified and fire continues burning through the roof. Firefighters are transitioning to a defensive fire attack. Currently, 90 firefighters are assigned to the incident.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CE43 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E20 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E27 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA3 RA803 SQ21 T10 T15 T2 T21 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange
